data: A small, wiry, red-haired man scrambled through the thick growth of brush, half slid and half plunged down a steep declivity and halted in the middle of the hard, worn road where he drew a deep breath, wiped the sweat from his face and consulted a huge silver watch.
browsing: crime/mystery|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: crime, thrillers and mystery|category: adventure|category: novels|category: american literature
